manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Philips 3000 Series Handheld Steamer Easy de-wrinkling at home and on-the-go Our handheld steamer 3000 Series is designed to be light, compact and foldable for easy usage and storage to re-assure fresh outfits anytime, anywhere. It is your ideal companion for easy and quick touch-up at home or on the go. Compact and foldable solution Safe on all ironable fabrics no burns guaranteed! 100ml detachable water tank up for easy refill No ironing board needed! Save time and hassle! Compact and foldable steamer, easy to use and store

Compact and foldable Our handheld steamer 3000 Series is designed to be light, compact and foldable for easy usage and storage to re-assure fresh outfits anytime, anywhere. It is your ideal companion for easy and quick touch-up at home or on the go. Ready to use in ˜30 seconds Ready to start steaming in just 30 seconds. The light indicates when you are ready to start, so you're finished in no-time. No waiting, no hassle. 1000W, up to 20g/min Our handheld steamer delivers up to 20g/min continuous steam, thanks to its 1000W. For quick and convenient steaming. No ironing board needed Hassle-free steaming. Save time when you are in a rush, no need to set up the ironing board.

100ml detachable water tank Handheld steamer 3000 Series comes with a 100ml detachable water tank to steam up to a full outfit without the need to refill. You can easily detach the water tank of your steamer and refill it under the sink. Kills 99.9% of bacteria* Past few months made us look more for healthy and hygienic solutions. Our handheld steamer kills 99.9% of bacteria*. You can even steam your curtains and bedsheets. Refresh and remove odors The hot steam of our handheld steamer 3000 Series refreshes your delicate clothes in an instant, removing odors. Wash less, iron less, save energy, and you will prolong the lifespan of your garments! Safe on all ironable fabrics Our steamer is safe to use on all ironable fabrics and garments. Our steam plate can be safely pressed against any clothing with no risk of burning; a great solution for delicate fabrics like silk.
*Tested 1 minute stationary by external body for bacteria types Escherichia coli 8099, Staphylicoccus aureus. ATCC 6538, Canidia albicans ATCC 10231.
*Tested 1 minute stationary by external body for bacteria types Escherichia coli 8099, Staphylicoccus aureus. ATCC 6538, Canidia albicans ATCC 10231.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So easy to get wrinkles out of clothes with this. It’s small and easy to travel with. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: This is a good travel steamer. It's compact and heats up quickly. I wouldn't recommend it for at home use, the cord is a bit short and the water tank doesn't hold much. I tried it out on my curtains but the cord couldn't reach far enough to finish and I had to refill it quickly. It worked great on a wrinkled tshirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great hand held iron/steamer!
reviews.reviewText: Love this hand held iron/steamer. Gets the job done and the best part is I don’t need a giant folding table to make my clothes look neat and pressed. Great quality, great product. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, nice and compact.
reviews.reviewText: This Philips 300 series handheld steamer is just great. It has completely made me almost independent of an iron, which I onlybuse for pants. The steamer comes in 2 parts the body and the attachment capsule for water. The handle folds for storage and unfolds for use. There's the power button and a light indicator that it's on. It starts steaming almost immediately upon powering on. There's no dripping of water as the capsule is well secured. It's powerful and has worked on every fabric I've used it on. And yes, it can work on pants too but I just like my pants with creases. Oh and it's absolutely awesome for linen and satin fabrics. I've evenbused it on fur and faux fur products. It's also great for fabrics with prints or graphics on them as it doesn't burn or smear them. I've also traveled with it which is awesome and it takes up very little space and its light. Just an amazing product this steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: La plancha parece usada, está rayada y venía con un polvillo parecido a sarro.Usé transformador al momento de enchufarlo; pero no funciona. Estoy en proceso de devolución.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't produce as much steam as other steamers. Takes longer to steam clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves time and makes clothes look great!
reviews.reviewText: I prefer to steam my clothes because ironing takes too long and doesn’t really produce much better results. I previously used a little no-name travel steamer, so this Phillips steamer is quite an upgrade. I was really impressed by how quickly it heats up- within 30 seconds, it produces hot and effective steam to attack the wrinkles in my clothes. Unlike my old steamer, this has a little trigger to release the steam is burst as I need it. The result is that I use less water, and the room doesn’t get all steamy and hot from having a constant stream of steam coming out. The wrinkles in my clothes release almost instantly when the steam hits them, and clothes look fresh and sharp. I love that I can easily use this for a quick touch when I get my clothes ready the night before, or even when I’m getting ready. I don’t plan on traveling with mine, but it folds up very compact and can be taken on the road if necessary. This product is a must for people that hate to iron their clothes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Handy, portable steamer
reviews.reviewText: I have never been a big fan of irons and ironing boards, so a steamer seemed like a better an safer alternative for our needs.I love that this is compact and portable so it is easy to put in a suitcase for a road trip when your clothes need refreshing. It also removes bacteria - which is a bonus when it comes to bedding and seating.We have 2 dogs in our home so it can be hard to keep things looking and feeling fresh. This steamer is a fast solution to fix wrinkles and refresh fabrics.Since this only uses water, it is safe to use on pretty much every type of fabric. The instructions do recommend using distilled water though - since water can sometimes be hard or carry impurities.The cord is a little limited if you are trying to cover large surfaces and it won't do as permanent a press as an iron can. But for the convenience factor alone I do recommend it.It heats up fast and does the job well and will definitely improve the appearance of anything you use it on.
The product produces steam quickly, is easy to use and is very portable.
Al abrir el producto noté que tiene marcas de haber sido usado. Los orificios donde sale el vapor tiene polvo blanco (como salitre) y la superficie que hace con la tela está rayada.
The steamer works perfectly, it's light and easy to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as good as an iron
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, but it requires some effort and time for thick fabric clothes.
Very compact, however the stream of steam was not strong enough to tackle wrinkles in a blouse. Had to return and buy a different brand.
